scripts.debug: cd frontend; npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend; npm install && npm run debug
scripts.dev: cd frontend; npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend; npm install && npm start

scripts.backend: cd backend; npm install && npm start
scripts.backend-dev: cd backend; npm install && npm start
scripts.backend-debug: cd backend; npm install && npm run debug
